name: Sleeping Draught
effect: Make the drinker quickly fall into a deep but temporary sleep
ingredients: 4 sprigs of Lavender, 6 measures of Standard Ingredient, 2 blobs of Flobberworm Mucus, 4 Valerian sprigs, Wormwood, Powdered Asphodel petals, Flobberworm Mucus, Sopophorous bean, Valerian sprigs, Nettle essence
